addon.name: TV Portal
addon.provider-name: noobsandnerds.com (forked from original work by spoyser and DixieDean)

extension.description: A fully customisable EPG which can link to any addons, streams and even PVR clients within Kodi. This is the only EPG that offers the ability to import your own XML TV listings (online or locally), convert into a fast responsive database and automatically update the database as and when the XML changes. Big thanks to twinther for the original TV Guide code and everone who worked on the On-Tapp.TV guide which this was originally forked from.
